title: Great movie
review: Maybe a bit long, but really fascinating story and good acting.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: Not my thing
review: It's well done and spectacular, but I couldn't really get into the story. All these beings, monsters, etc. made it difficult to focus. Well, it's just no my taste, I guess.

title: Enjoy the ride
review: Spectacular movie, nice stunts. Just what you need to relax after a hard day. Hard day? Not really.... THEY are having a hard day 😊🤣👍.
